tool_description: Analyzes return patterns and customer behavior to identify potential fraudulent return activities and suspicious patterns.

return_ids.description: List of return transaction IDs to analyze for fraud patterns

fraud_sensitivity.description: Sensitivity level for fraud detection: low, medium, high

error_messages: Invalid fraud sensitivity: Use one of [low, medium, high]
Customer data missing: Unable to perform fraud analysis without customer information
Insufficient pattern data: Not enough return history to establish baseline patterns for fraud detection
usage: Provide return_ids to analyze for potential fraud patterns. Adjust fraud_sensitivity based on desired strictness of fraud detection.

fraud_risk_scores.description: Risk scores for each analyzed return (0-1 scale)

high_risk_returns.description: Return IDs flagged as high fraud risk
